channel.title: EP and some other ?'s
channel.description:
Well since I've started again..just for pking.
How would I go about raising my ep %?
I've been risking 27k + r2h no pray and it wont go up..
Few side questions:
On average, how long would it take to mine 1k pure ess @ 66 mining? How long would it take to collect 10k snapes? [By days]

item.title: EP and some other ?'s
item.dc:creator: @maminerr maminerr
item.description:
@maminerr wrote:

on the ep question,
you have to be risking 100k+
be in a hot spot:
ie: outside of a bank is a hot spot
it takes 30 minutes per 25% ep.
(meaning 100% is around 2 hours)

Read full topic

item.title: EP and some other ?'s
item.dc:creator: @Dumke_AtomicFury Dumke[AtomicFury]
item.description:
@Dumke_AtomicFury wrote:

Well, EP you would be best just to wait it out in the mage area in level 55 wildy.

1k pure ess @ 66mining?

summoning level?

cause with some titan , you can hold ess and get 1k per hour,

but other wise, at wizards guild, you can get it in about 1 and half.

10k snapes, bot or hand?

bot = 2 days.
hand = 3 - 4.

Read full topic
